Review: The car looks a bit old model with the stepney at the back and the lights thar blunt without any sharp edges ... Overall the performance is very nice with good mileage and also the seating is very comfortable but it lacks a new age music system having an only option of CD's , the boot space and luggage space at the back is large.
Nice car ML 250 is very good service Nice looking styles and value for money and good luck Nice इंटीरियर
